name: Covid-19 (krbeda)
description:
This is basic and informative game about novel corona virus. 

In this you have to save your self from 3 types of corona viruses and keep distance from infected people ( red color same as player). white person is normal person. Keep distance if you are infected, otherwise you can interact with them. If you infected somebody else your score goes to negative. 

  Support Us to Improve this game and suggest us what you want more. also Expert can give advise  to improve this game. 

Your small support give big motivation to me to develop more these kind of informative and awareness game 

ControlWindowSmartphone (Android)JumpSpace Button on Keyboard touch on screen
Wash HandPress " W/w " on Keyboard Tap on hand wash Button
